thread.title: Stocks rally as Trump tweet eases trade war fears

title: Stocks rally as Trump tweet eases trade war fears
text:
Stocks rally as Trump tweet eases trade war fears Monday, April 09, 2018 - 01:46 
Global stocks rose on Monday as the U.S. government played down fears of a trade war with China which has roiled markets over the last week. Sonia Legg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Global stocks rose on Monday as the U.S. government played down fears of a trade war with China which has roiled markets over the last week. Sonia Legg reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HlCFEe
